title: 'If Glasgow fails, whole thing fails', says Johnson
content: The UK prime minister says there are no compelling reasons for procrastination on climate change.

title: 'If Glasgow fails, whole thing fails', says Johnson
content: The UK prime minister says there are no compelling reasons for procrastination on climate change.

title: G20 pledge climate action but make few commitments
content: The agreement between the world's richest economies makes no reference to cutting emissions by 2050.

title: Extreme weather events are 'the new norm'
content: Scientists from the WMO say global warming is leading the world into "uncharted territory".

title: Tokyo subway knife and fire attack leaves 17 hurt
content: Video footage shows passengers desperately running from fire and a man said to be wielding a knife.

title: Swift performs at Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
content: Carole King, Jay-Z and Foo Fighters and others were inducted at a star studded Rock and Roll Hall of Fame ceremony.

title: 'Father of tiramisu' Ado Campeol dies aged 93
content: Campeol owned a restaurant in Italy where the dessert was invented by his wife and a pastry chef.

title: Man dies during Spanish bull-running event
content: Authorities said the man suffered a head wound and had an artery punctured in his thigh by the bull.

title: Up to France to end fishing row, says UK
content: Boris Johnson tells Emmanuel Macron to "de-escalate the rhetoric" around the post-Brexit issues.

title: Gunmen attack Afghan wedding to stop music
content: The attack by men who identified themselves as Taliban has left at least two dead, officials say.

title: Car bombing at Yemen airport kills nine
content: The attack near Aden's airport is the deadliest to strike the temporary capital since last year.

title: Jailed three times for refusing to join the army
content: Most Jewish Israelis do military service. But a small number, like Shahar, take an ideological stance.

title: Japan ruling party set for reduced majority
content: Prime Minister Fumio Kishida's party will have a reduced majority in the lower house, exit polls say.

title: Three people die on paddleboarding river trip
content: Two women and a man died at the scene, while a fourth person is in a critical condition in hospital.

title: Baldwin speaks about 'one in a trillion' shooting
content: In his first public comments, the actor says the cinematographer he accidentally shot was his friend.
